name: SA_COLLECTION_EMOTES
description: Use every emote in the game.

name: SA_GATHERING_FAME_03
displayName: Gathering is not a game! It's war!

name: SA_REPUTATION_GOOD
description: Reach the first positive reputation level.

name: SA_COLLECTION_UNLOCK_WEAPONS
description: Unlock all Tier 4 weapons and offhands.

name: SA_PVE_KILL_T1
description: Kill 100 Tier 1 mobs of any kind.

name: SA_SOCIAL_FRIEND_01
description: Add a friend to your friend list.

name: SA_COLLECTION_SILVER
description: Have a character that owns a million silver.

name: SA_PVP_KILL_PLAYER_01
description: Kill or assist a kill in PvP.

name: SA_PVP_KILL_PLAYER_02
description: Kill 300 players in the open world.

name: SA_FISHING_FAME_03
displayName: You're Gonna Need a Bigger Boat

name: SA_GATHERING_TERRITORY_RAID
description: Gather any Tier 8 resource in an enemy territory.

name: SA_PLAYERISLAND_BUILD_01
description: Build a house on your island.

name: SA_PLAYERISLAND_BUILD_02
description: Upgrade a house on your island to Tier 8.

name: SA_PLAYERISLAND_LABORER_02
description: Have a Tier 8 Laborer and send them on a mission.

name: SA_PLAYERISLAND_LABORER_03
description: Send a Laborer with maxed-out Happiness on a mission.

name: SA_PLAYERISLAND_MAX
description: Upgrade your island to the maximum of 6/6.

name: SA_PVP_GVG_WIN_01
displayName: All Your Base are Belong to Us
description: Participate in a successful attack on a territory.

name: SA_PVP_TERMINATOR
displayName: Give me your clothes, your boots and your mount...

name: SA_PVP_WIN_HELLGATE_01
description: Defeat a team of enemy players in any type of Hellgate.

name: SA_TRADE_ANY_ITEM_BM
description: Sell any item on the Black Market in Caerleon.

name: SA_TRADE_ANY_ITEM_MP
description: Sell any item through the Marketplace.

name: SA_TRADE_SILVER_01
description: Earn a total of 100,000 Silver through the Marketplace.

name: SA_TRADE_SILVER_02
description: Earn a total of 1,000,000 Silver through the Marketplace.

name: SA_TRADE_SILVER_03
description: Earn a total of 10,000,000 Silver through the Marketplace.

name: SA_FACTIONWARFARE_JOIN
description: Join any of the six City Factions.

name: SA_FACTIONWARFARE_KILLBOSS_ALL
description: Defeat all opposing City Faction Warmasters at least once.

name: SA_FACTIONWARFARE_STANDING_MAX
description: Achieve a standing of 330,000 to be promoted to the first Prestige Rank.

name: SA_FACTIONWARFARE_TRADEMISSION_01
description: Finish a Trade Mission for any city.

name: SA_COLLECTION_OVERCHARGE_01
description: Overcharge one or more equipped items.

name: SA_ANNIVERSARY_01
description: Be part of Albion for one year.

name: SA_PVP_CRYSTAL_PARTICIPATION
description: Participate in a Crystal Realm Battle.

name: SA_COLLECTION_PARTYFINDER
description: Use the Party Finder to form or join a party.

name: SA_PVE_RANDOMDUNGEON_LEGENDARY
description: Kill the legendary Morgana Demon General, Keeper Earth Aspirant, Undead Reaper, and Heretic Shadowmask.

name: SA_PVE_KILL_MINIGUARDIANS
description: Kill a Guardian Aspect from every biome.

name: SA_COLLECTION_LOOTCHEST
description: Unlock your first chest in any kind of randomized dungeon.

name: SA_COLLECTION_VANITY_MOUNTSKIN
displayName: Look at my horse, my horse is amazing!

name: SA_PVE_RANDOMDUNGEON_LOOTCHEST_SOLO_01
description: Unlock 10 chests in solo randomized dungeons.

name: SA_PVE_RANDOMDUNGEON_LOOTCHEST_SOLO_02
description: Unlock 100 chests in solo randomized dungeons.

name: SA_PVE_RANDOMDUNGEON_LOOTCHEST_GROUP_01
description: Unlock 10 chests with your party in group randomized dungeons.

name: SA_PVE_RANDOMDUNGEON_LOOTCHEST_GROUP_02
description: Unlock 100 chests with your party in group randomized dungeons.

name: SA_PVE_RANDOMDUNGEON_LOOTCHEST_ELITE_01
description: Unlock 10 chests in Elite Randomized Dungeons.

name: SA_PVE_RANDOMDUNGEON_LOOTCHEST_ELITE_02
description: Unlock 100 chests in Elite Randomized Dungeons.

name: SA_PVE_KILL_RD_ELITE_01
displayName: In a League of Their Own
description: Kill the following Avalonian bosses in Elite Randomized Dungeons: Knight Captain, Construct, Crystal Basilisk, High Priestess, Archmage.

name: SA_PVE_KILL_RD_ELITE_02
description: Kill Sir Bedivere in an Elite Randomized Dungeon.

name: SA_PVP_CRYSTAL_LEAGUE_RANK_01
description: Win a Crystal League Match of Rank 3.

name: SA_PVP_CRYSTAL_LEAGUE_RANK_02
description: Win a Crystal League Match of Rank 7.

name: SA_PVP_TERRITORY_DEFEAT_COMMANDER
description: Defeat the Sentry Mage in an enemy territory.

name: SA_COLLECTION_ELITE_DUNGEON_BUFF
description: Receive the buff from the final shrine in an Elite Randomized Dungeon.

name: SA_PVP_CORRUPTED_DUNGEON_01
description: Defeat an invading player in a Corrupted Dungeon.

name: SA_PVP_CORRUPTED_DUNGEON_02
description: Defeat another player after invading their Corrupted Dungeon.

name: SA_COLLECTION_CORRUPTED_DUNGEONS_INFAMY
displayName: On and On, South of Avalon
description: Unlock the Slayer difficulty in Corrupted Dungeons.

name: SA_PVE_CORRUPTED_DUNGEONS_01
description: Defeat the final boss in a Corrupted Dungeon.

name: SA_COLLECTION_ROADS_02
description: Enter a Deep Road of Avalon.

name: SA_PVE_ROADS_GUARDIAN
displayName: Big Game Hunter in Another World
description: Defeat a Guardian in a Road of Avalon.

name: SA_PVE_ROADS_AVALON
description: Defeat 250 Avalonians in the Roads of Avalon.

name: SA_COLLECTION_HELLGATE_01
description: Gain 100,000 Infamy in any Hellgate type.

name: SA_COLLECTION_HELLGATE_02
description: Gain 250,000 Infamy in any Hellgate type.

name: SA_EXPLORATION_CHAIN_HELLGATE_01
description: Chain 2 lethal Hellgates without returning to the surface.

name: SA_EXPLORATION_CHAIN_HELLGATE_02
description: Chain 5 lethal Hellgates without returning to the surface.

name: SA_EXPLORATION_CHAIN_HELLGATE_03
description: Chain 10 lethal Hellgates without returning to the surface.

name: SA_FACTIONWARFARE_CLUSTER_CAPTURE
description: Assist in completely capturing another city's zone in Faction Warfare.
